verses.verse: And these are the inheritances which the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took<WH5157> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, which Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548>, and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' houses of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, distributed unto them<WH5157>,
by the lot<WH1486> of their inheritance<WH5159>, as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by<WH3027> Moses<WH4872>, for the nine<WH8672> tribes<WH4294>, and for the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH4294>.

For Moses<WH4872> had given<WH5414> the inheritance<WH5159> of the two<WH8147> tribes<WH4294> and the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH4294> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383>: but unto the Levites<WH3881> he gave<WH5414> no inheritance<WH5159> among them<WH8432>.

For the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> were two<WH8147> tribes<WH4294>, Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim<WH669>: and they gave<WH5414> no portion<WH2506> unto the Levites<WH3881> in the land<WH776>, save cities<WH5892> to dwell<WH3427> in<WH4054>, with the suburbs thereof for their cattle<WH4735> and for their substance<WH7075>.
As Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>, so the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213>; and they divided<WH2505> the land<WH776>.

Then the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> drew<WH5066> nigh unto Joshua<WH3091> in Gilgal<WH1537>: and Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenizzite<WH7074> said<WH559> unto him<WH3045>, Thou knowest the thing<WH1697> that Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> concerning me<WH182> and concerning thee<WH182> in Kadesh-barnea<WH6947>.

Forty <WH705> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> was I when Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of Jehovah<WH3068> sent<WH7971> me from Kadesh-barnea<WH6947> to spy out<WH7270> the land<WH776>; and I brought<WH7725> him word<WH1697> again<WH7725> as it was in my heart<WH3824>.
Nevertheless my brethren<WH251> that went up<WH5927> with me made the heart<WH3820> of the people<WH5971> melt<WH4529>; but I wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Jehovah<WH3068> my God<WH430>.

And Moses<WH4872> sware<WH7650> on that day<WH3117>, saying<WH559>, Surely the land<WH776> whereon thy foot<WH7272> hath trodden<WH1869> shall be an inheritance<WH5159> to thee and to thy children<WH1121> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, because thou hast wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Jehovah<WH3068> my God<WH430>.

And now<WH3068>, behold, Jehovah hath kept me alive<WH2421>, as he spake<WH1696>, these forty<WH705> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141>, from the time<WH227> that Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> this word<WH1697> unto Moses<WH4872>, while Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> in the wilderness<WH4057>: and now<WH3117>, lo, I am this day fourscore<WH8084> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old<WH1121>.

As yet I am as strong<WH2389> this day<WH3117> as I as in the day<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> me<WH3581>: as my strength was then<WH3581>, even so is my strength now<WH4421>, for war, and to go out<WH3318> and to come in<WH935>.

Now therefore give<WH5414> me this hill-country<WH2022>, whereof Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> in that day<WH3117>; for thou heardest<WH8085> in that day<WH3117> how the Anakim<WH6062> were there<WH5892>, and cities great<WH1419> and fortified<WH1219>: it may be that Jehovah<WH3068> will be<WH194> with<WH854> me<WH3423>, and I shall drive them out, as Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696>.
And Joshua<WH3091> blessed<WH1288> him<WH5414>; and he gave Hebron<WH2275> unto Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> for an inheritance<WH5159>.

Therefore Hebron<WH2275> became the inheritance<WH5159> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenizzite<WH7074> unto this day<WH3117>; because that he wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>.

Now the name<WH8034> of Hebron<WH2275> beforetime<WH6440> was Kiriath-arba<WH7153>; which Arba was the greatest<WH1419> man<WH120> among the Anakim<WH6062>. And the land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> from war<WH4421>.
